website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable HeatGear fabric with strategically placed mesh for ventilation. Ideal if you prefer a high neckline.
pros: Polyester/Elastane blend that is UPF 30 to protect skin from UV exposure
Between anti-odor and wick-away technologies, this shirt is a top pick for outdoor exercise or as a base layer
cons: Not ideal if you have a longer torso, as it comes up a bit short
Some people dislike the contrast stitching

customer_reviews.title: Wear them 7 days a week.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1 size larger than what the chart says. I didn't want it to be so tight that it was hard to put on and taken off. Overall, the sizing was perfect. I wear these as undershirts and they work fantastic for that purpose. If you conceal carry and your firearm's slide or your IWB holster stick to your skin? This is a great shirt to use to get rid of the issue.
customer_reviews.author: FrEaK_aCcIdEnT

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit & look but not enough length.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and look of the shirt. However, like most other Under Armour compression shirts that I've purchased this shirt constantly rises from the waist while I'm working out. Having to constantly pull my shirt down while I'm working out is very annoying. Until Under Armour decides to extend the length of some of these shirts I will have to look else where to purchase compression shirts. For that reason I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very good compression and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight and doesn't roll up. It is also very easy to get on and off. Had a Spanx shirt and that was a pain the the A** to keep on and in place with all it's rolling up all the time. This shirt is comfortable enough to wear all day. It's like a full body hug all the time. Blow out air from lungs and feel the fabric closing in to fill the void. Real nice. Makes me look very good in a dress shirt like it should. Will update later when I see how it stand up to washing and time.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R. Gross

customer_reviews.title: One of the best compression shirts out there.
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely. For sizing: I wear them as a true compression shirt for the gym; not as a muscle tee. I wear an XLT t-shirt and a medium compression shirt under said t shirt. If you're going for that mid-life crisis/weekend cyclist/bro look I might just go one size smaller than your t shirt size instead. It is a little see through which may be an issue if you're wearing it alone. Finally, it has some gray on it so it wouldn't work under a white dress shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Under Armour brand Sleeveless T-shirt compression product .
customer_reviews.text: This product under armour is absolutely give me confort to wear ... a compression that really press my body , specially my big belly reduce it to a moderate one . I looked at the miror my body sideway, it looks that my big belly is not anymore revealing bulky ! I will need more that I was satisfied with the out come that made my body in great shape . Thanks for the excellent stuff under armour brand .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You want Under Armour
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these compression shirts for about 7 years now along with other brands and you guys are going to want to stick with the UA brand even if they're a little bit more. Other brands tend to rip and get holes MUCH faster than the UA. I think the longest I had one of these shirts was 5 years with weekly washing and no other brand has ever lasted more than a few washes. They used to be touted as anti-microbial as well but I don't see that anywhere listed. Oh and buy smaller than you think. I wear XL and for compression shirts I wear a medium for these sleeveless.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality comfort, useful for any situation.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a major UA fan, so any gift from this brand I instantly gain ++Daddy points. He uses this under his uniform and for his workouts. Both give him a comfort feel different from any other garment he uses for these purposes. Great product, craftsmanship and usefulness.
customer_reviews.author: John Alonzo

customer_reviews.title: Love these shirts but I wear three sizes larger than normal
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these shirts for working out and biking when the weather gets extremely hot. I have a similar long sleeve shirt that I use for biking now that the weather is getting cooler. Comfortable material, holds its shape and stands up to being washed. Sizing, I mostly wear XL or sometimes L shirts. I know these are supposed to be tight but for me an XL would be ridiculous, I do not have the build for that. So, I use 3XL and it is tight around the waste but looser on the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Beltway insider

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for two reasons: 1) For an under shirt while doing yardwork in our 115°+ heat, and 2) As an under shirt to tuck in to use at our local Mud Run. This works great. I actually doubled - no joke - my yardwork since I didn't get as hot with this underneath my t-shirt. It also stayed tucked in during the entire grizzling Mud Run, obstacles and all. Definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits AMAZING! Bought a size S for myself (woman's review)
customer_reviews.text: I needed a plain design Under Armour muscle tee shirt for work, but I honestly did not like the designs in the women section. So, I decided to buy a size S in men's for these basic ones in blue and white. (For the ladies reference, I am 5'0", muscular build, not so busty lol, and 26" waist). They fit perfectly! I'm glad I was able to also save money buying the plain designs and how the small fit my torso really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney The Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Under Armor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of these for my son. He has worn these for years. His old ones are over five years old. I thought he could use some new ones. He wears these everyday as undershirts for the most part. He said they have improved the shirts even more since his last ones. These are the best on the market and worth every penny. As I said, my son still has some that were purchased over five years ago and still going strong:)
customer_reviews.author: Crazed One In The Burg

customer_reviews.title: Have a style while you burn
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shirt about 4 days a week for the last month. The fit is perfect, medium, for my 5'8" 160lbs frame. I wear this strictly for when I'm jogging. It gives me a nice streamlined look while maintaining moderate warmth to my core. The contrasting stitching and sudo-mandarin collar also adds to the look of active wear not just a compression the.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Feel like an athlete
customer_reviews.text: After I wear this UA gear, I feel like I am performing better in the gym, and I think I became stronger(not even kidding). I luv its fit and texture. It doesnt get loose even though I do laundry so many times(but I'm still worried, so I wash it by myself when I take a shower). I recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Aiden Hong

customer_reviews.title: ... trains Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and this Under Armour sleeveless is perfect to wear under the GI and no GI
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband as he trains Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and this Under Armour sleeveless is perfect to wear under the GI and no GI. he hes comfortable and highly recommends it. few guys in the gym are now using them. :)
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Armour Sleeveless Compression T-shirt
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth UA sleeveless compression t-shirt! It works as design to keep you warm during your workout, so you can get a better sweat. More importantly, this compression t-shirt winks away moisture eliminating that heavy shirt feel you get halfway into your workout or activity. I would recommend this one; give it a try! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: demfbo1

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for compression cause of a surgery I had last year removing 12 lymph nodes from my right axillary (arm pit) I now have slight lymphedema on my left breast and upper arm near the under arm. Compression is needed and we didn’t know if insurance would cover a proper garment. I wouldn’t get these again
customer_reviews.author: DougE

customer_reviews.title: Fine but the non-compression shirts feel much cooler
customer_reviews.text: The shirt was fine.. However, once I wore it a few times, I found that I was not really into the whole "compression shirt" thing. I wear my other UA HeatGear shirts much more frequently. I feel a little silly when I wear the thing; more importantly the non-compression shirts feel much cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Rob DC

customer_reviews.title: Not compressive in the least
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I've misunderstood what a compression shirt is, but this sure isn't it. I ordered a small based off of the size chart and this fits just like a regular, lose-fitting, workout tank. Absolutely worthless for what I expect and need from a compression shirt. If I can get an XS and it's actually compressive I'll change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Hat

customer_reviews.title: whoa that's tight, even for me...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely tight and once you finally get this on, good luck getting it off again. I know it's a compression shirt and the Small size fits up to a 36" chest but that's what I am, and it's clearly meant for a smaller frame. They should have made larger or put more elasticity into the shirts. It's a shame,, they look pretty good, but back they go
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: You May Want To Order A Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: Nice shirt but order a size larger . I can always wear a large but this product looks like a child large. Sending back for XL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a UA shirt that fits
customer_reviews.text: I am someone with a fairly long torso, so whenever I purchase UA tops they tend to be on the short side which means I have to get a size larger. Well, thanks for providing an extra long shirt so I can purchase my actual size. No complaints. Awesome..
customer_reviews.author: DaddyBigDraws

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This shirt is comfortable and great for workouts. Only thing I have noticed, that may just be me is after a while my skin feels stingy or itchy. This is probably due to sweat as I wear this as an undershirt as well and don't have problems through out the day.
customer_reviews.author: mrainer

customer_reviews.title: you will not receive full credit for return...why?
customer_reviews.text: I relied on the sizing chart on Amazon. ordered the size. it was too small. ordered next size up...still too small and does not even resemble the size chart. I am only getting half my money back for returning despite the fact i only tried it on to see if they fit. I have purchased many items from amazon and under armour. I may stop using both if this is how business is conducted. Amazon, see my account. not happy with your service and i rarely return items
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L corbett

customer_reviews.title: The right fit
customer_reviews.text: It's my first compression shirt that I buy. I've had it for couple months now and it has kept it's stretchiness! I use it 4 times a week for the gym and wash it every day. It's still like new. Great quality and overall great shirt to keep everything tucked in. I usually use a 4x shirt(i bought 3x) but I recommend buying one size smaller than your lose fitting shirts to keep everything tight when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Art_427

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Look I'm a 5 foot 7, 170 pound man. I either buy Larfe or Medium shirts, and I buy medium muscle shirts for the affect of working out. However this shirt runs way smaller than any other medium I have came across.
customer_reviews.author: James Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great for heat dissipation, runs a tad small.
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders in the heat. I'm a UPS driver and wear this under my uniform to wick away sweat and it does wonders for lowering my body temperature and making me feel cooler. Definitely fits snug, so I'd recommend ordering a size bigger than you usually wear.
customer_reviews.author: TBBoltzz

customer_reviews.title: Size way UP!
customer_reviews.text: Whatever you normally wear, size up two sizes. This thing is a rough fit. I got XL (5’11” x 180). Workout like 6 days a week. This thing still tries to anaconda strangle me.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun A. Whitehorse

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Product is supposed to be brand new when we received it it already had to deoderant marks on the in and outside of the Garment where it had been previously worn. Rather disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: walley

customer_reviews.title: the old is new
customer_reviews.text: Material: good quality. Neck elasticity: excessive ( looks like this was a return then resold as new) neck area is too loose for being a "new" product. If it wasn't for the neck issue, this would of been a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: José M. Hernández Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good great for workouts daily wear.
customer_reviews.text: Got this small shirt on sale for $15. Great for workouts especially running allows underarm air flow. Also good for daily wear under polo type shirts for posture support. Material feels good. Liked so much I got 3 more colors. Me: 5’10” average/fit body type.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy 6ft 300+lbs I bought a 4x for wearing under my work shirts and it fits perfectly and is so comfy.
customer_reviews.author: chris holt

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, great material
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit, great material. Bought the blue one as well. Use one or the other every day when I work out.
customer_reviews.author: Eliezel Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Best compression fit/wicking shirt I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I sweat buckets in the summer. This is a must to keep your top layer dry. This is the best compression fit/wicking shirt I have ever owned. I bought two more after I tried this one out.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL P STEWART

customer_reviews.title: After years of buying the Starter versions from Wal-Mart I ...
customer_reviews.text: After years of buying the Starter versions from Wal-Mart I finally decided to drop the money on a actual UA. The difference is staggering. Sometimes you really do get what you pay for. I'll never buy a Starter again, that' for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Action Gear
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything U.A. makes is quality. Don't over machine wash in hot water. I have four of these shirts and they wear out from harsh soap. (betcha)
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Kaiser Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’3 350 pounds, I love the snug fit of the 2xl tall black sleeveless under shirt. Product is high-quality. My only complaint is the under armor symbol on the chest can be seen through certain dress shirts that are thinner. I own five of these undershirts and will be buying more when they’re back in stock!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent under layer for comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my son to wear underwear his high school football uniform. He loves them and ask for 5 more....
customer_reviews.author: EDF

customer_reviews.title: I use these when cycling and I like them
customer_reviews.text: I wear these shirts under my jersey when cycling in warm weather. I've been using them for about a year, and so far so good. The fit is snug (as can be expected from a compression shirt) and the shirt keeps me dry with its moisture wicking ability.
customer_reviews.author: Boston, MA

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Nice fit. Great shirt to work out in!
customer_reviews.author: Asia Mac

customer_reviews.title: I wear these primarily as an undershirt(under a normal T-shirt ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these primarily as an undershirt(under a normal T-shirt or untucked dress shirt) for firearm concealed carry. Thin enough and breathable even in hot weather but the smooth, stretchy material keeps my weapon, mags and gear from chaffing or snagging.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Karma

customer_reviews.title: Great for big guys
customer_reviews.text: I am a very big guy 390 6'4" when I started wearing the shirt so I could work out. Works great holding everything in place. Only wish I had ordered a size smaller cause I lost 30 pounds very fast 😀 enjoy fellow big dudes
customer_reviews.author: Jack Berry

customer_reviews.title: You need to be pretty fit to make this look good so keep that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit small but it is suppose to be a compression shirt so I guess that's the way it is suppose to fit. You need to be pretty fit to make this look good so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Tough Mudder
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Tough Mudder. Wanted to go sleeveless because entry numbers are written on shoulders. This shirt performed well in 12 1/2 & 20 obstacles, many of them mud. Have subsequently worn in in several workouts. Washes well, wears well, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: F. Sealey

customer_reviews.title: Improved version of already good product
customer_reviews.text: Authentic item, and a significant improvement over previous generations. I have a similar UA compression cutoff from ~2010 that is still going strong and I still appreciate, but I finally broke down and added this new upgrade to the workout wardrobe, and we’ll worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: quality issues
customer_reviews.text: comfortable fit...first time washing it, found a hole on the left side along the seam approximately an inch long....still does the job that I want....just feel that it should have been a little more durable
customer_reviews.author: John Cox

customer_reviews.title: Use this for work and gym
customer_reviews.text: I love these shirts! I use it for under my scrubs or for working out at the gym. Helps to wick away the sweat. Love the under armour products over the nike products.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Suber

customer_reviews.title: Under armor quality... Costs a little more but worth it...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to yoga and Ireland... High-quality and they stay out of the way when I’m working out... That’s all I can ask... Great cuts and material...
customer_reviews.author: Rob Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Fitting was off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make give me a slimmer look, but the fitting was off. I guess you need to be slim to wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Facemyer

customer_reviews.title: Very tight, even for compression
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and 4 other compression shirts on Amazon, all size Large. This is so tight it is barely wearable and the others are very loose. Good quality fabric and light weight, but go up a few sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Brad V.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my junk from Jiggling. 😎 I normally wear large shirts but I order mediums in these to keep the shirt firm and make my body look better.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Peck

customer_reviews.title: Great compression top.
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for sleveless compression shirt for a long time. It's not easy when you need a tall size. Came across this top and it is perfect. Great quality, great fit and lightweight It is great as a baselayer compression as well. Allows for excellent movement.
customer_reviews.author: BA

customer_reviews.title: Low level of compression, does work to cool off skin
customer_reviews.text: It seems counter-intuitive but the material does wick away sweat and allow for better skin cooling than not wearing a shirt or wearing a looser fit singlet. The amount of compression isn't that great. I'd say it is more of a painted-on look but nothing really compressive.
customer_reviews.author: ChazTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Thought the tank top was going to be loose but nope! The compressed tank top fits perfectly. If you have a muscular aesthetic build with six pack abs, this will fit you like a glove :)
customer_reviews.author: Khanh Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Wear a 5xl tee shirt so bought a 4xl to work out with to help me sweat more. It has worked great and is very good quality. I’ve purchased black and grey and they fit perfect under any shirt I have
customer_reviews.author: Marckixks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect fit, little pricey, was cheaper on under armour website, but with prime shipping, can't beat buying on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this style, but I just with the neck WW looser or a V-type neck that was not so tight. I took 3 of these to my trailer and had them altered to give a little more breathing room in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Josh LeGassick

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Compression Shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Literally the absolute perfect compression sleeveless shirt. Couldn’t ask for anything more, I bought 4.
customer_reviews.author: The Kamerman Family

customer_reviews.title: One Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the look and feel but as other reviewers have mentioned definitely get one size larger. I normally wear a small t-shirt but I ordered this in a medium and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ESK

customer_reviews.title: Fit good
customer_reviews.text: Very good for play basketball and other sports game , also wear it at gym
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: What I needed and will last compared to cheaper brands that I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Materials little itchy. Polly blend and not 100% Mulroney .
customer_reviews.author: bluechip

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Son uses UA tanks under his work shirts. Helps keep him cool. He likes them.
customer_reviews.author: maxamillion

customer_reviews.title: The Highest-quality compression shirt I've tried
customer_reviews.text: No other brands beat Under Armour when it comes to compression shirts. I've tried other brands and there's literally no comparison. There's a good reason this brand costs more and it's definitely worth it. Fits very comfortably, compresses very well, and has good durability.
customer_reviews.author: Noel Ibarra Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not really a compression shirt
customer_reviews.text: Has no compression, and the next size smaller just digs into my armpit
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a small in Nike dri-fit sleeveless This Under Armour is way smaller. Returned item.Nice material though.
customer_reviews.author: RSGTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great Shirt !
customer_reviews.text: The Shirt Is 100% Accurate, Great Fit & Looks Great !
customer_reviews.author: merle davenport

customer_reviews.title: Great for use on hot days at work.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and very well made. Have several and use them frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: Step Backwards on quality
customer_reviews.text: I have worn the Under Armour compression shirts for many years. Little has changed over the years except the logo placement. The latest version is a serious step backwards in quality and fit. The compression is extremely tight with little flex and the always comfortable material is now one step above burlap. I was shocked to see the sale price to these shirts for $20 but I couldn't resist. I am not sure the $5 savings was worth it for the new version of this shirt to be this quality. I will miss the previous versions of this shirt.
customer_reviews.author: meyerw

customer_reviews.title: They’re excellent
customer_reviews.text: Work great! They run a little small fyi and they’re longer than expected so take that into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Jon J.

customer_reviews.title: It good
customer_reviews.text: It's good and last long, and protects the 😰 sweat
customer_reviews.author: Mutasim Al-Sheibany

customer_reviews.title: Oxygen Please.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item in the past. Same size, XL, but fits very tight. Requires oxygen to breath fits so tight.
customer_reviews.author: Popolo's Ranch

customer_reviews.title: UA Quality
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason you were a gear forms to back phone of my workout clothing...
customer_reviews.author: Rob Osborne

customer_reviews.title: it doesn't bind or cut at the seams like some compression gear does
customer_reviews.text: For compression gear this product fits a bit larger than expected. However, it doesn't bind or cut at the seams like some compression gear does. Durability and odor resistance is unknown at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Icarus

customer_reviews.title: Check the size
customer_reviews.text: Good texture, but a bit tight more than I expected. ( though I chose my regular size which is small)
customer_reviews.author: Ara

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: 5 starts across the board, I love under armour, Products, they last long, and good Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Twan

customer_reviews.title: UA Is Worth It
customer_reviews.text: Wear it for hockey. Play 4 nights a week and almost 6 months later still no signs of wear and tear. UA is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SUAShawn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, feels very comfortable. Wear it as an undershirt and it works great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I keep falling for this. With this brand you need to order 2 sizes bigger.
customer_reviews.text: I keep falling for this. With this brand you need to order 2 sizes bigger.
customer_reviews.author: AK Wireless

customer_reviews.title: Horribly placed tag, makes annoying wear
customer_reviews.text: I live under armor shirts, but tag on these are unbearable. There is no tag on the neck line, it’s printed. However there is a tag on the left side near the stomach. It’s annoying as all get out. I cut it on the recommended cut line and it left my stomach red and itchy. Don’t even wear the shirt anymore.
customer_reviews.author: chris george

customer_reviews.title: ... performance of Under Armour gear is by far the best I've used thus far
customer_reviews.text: The quality and performance of Under Armour gear is by far the best I've used thus far. The item fits as expected and arrived as expected. I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for an under shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Florida671

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time now. Just wished the shirt sleeve was just as good.
customer_reviews.author: J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cut and fit, seams and under arm panels are better then other brands
customer_reviews.text: Husband looks super hot in them that says enough ;) he loves the side underarm panels which is where other brands split. This brand solved this issue by moving the seams in this area.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer bortell

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sports
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to replace thick Hanes tank tops that retain sweat for extended period of time. Not only do they feel significantly lighter, but they dry up quickly, all while sticking tight to your body improving aerodynamics. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: B.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Perfil Fit
customer_reviews.text: Just a perfect fit with the XL tight to the body like needed
customer_reviews.author: Salvadoreno

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like compression wear in general, but these are fantastic, and well priced.
customer_reviews.author: Josh P

customer_reviews.title: Suck it up
customer_reviews.text: When you’re fat and wanna look less fat get this
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be typical UA good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little tighter than I like but it did say it was fitted. It's like a light compression. If you don't like than then the next size up should help a little. Fabric is thin but seems durable. I wear this under a bullet proof vest and love that it covers most of my shoulder where my vest straps would rub. Great for hot day use.
customer_reviews.author: Studio-Steve

customer_reviews.title: The DRSKIN compression shirt I got is a 1000% better than this one
customer_reviews.text: Thank god I bought this with a gift card I was given, otherwise I would have returned it. Yea, it's a "compression" shirt...but doesn't compress as much as you'd think. Not worth the money in my opinion. The DRSKIN compression shirt I got is a 1000% better than this one!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Its a cool shirt and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a cool shirt and good quality, it was just a little small compared to what I thought it would be (probably due to my HUGE muscles), but that's ok ;)
customer_reviews.author: Master Chief

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have!
customer_reviews.text: Nothing compares to this product.. AMAZING!! Just don’t get white.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit compression shirt, dry fit material, tough stitching. Quality product from UA!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer
customer_reviews.text: I wore this all summer long and it held up great, I didnt feel soaked or wet from sweet. Highly recommend good quality
customer_reviews.author: Amateur-Angler

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: have multiple of this of different colors, great for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Melchor

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shirt for the gym and outdoor activities!
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: If it wasn't for these problems it could get a better rating.
customer_reviews.text: I trusted size chart when I shouldn't have. Compression is not strong enough based on size chart. Order one size smaller. Opening for arms has no structure, very loose fitting, no compression. I ordered Under Armour because of quality of their products, not with this purchase. If it wasn't for these problems it could get a better rating.
customer_reviews.author: Charles N.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and moisture wicking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect undershirt. Sucks in my less than perfect body and wicks sweat. Love these shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: UA heatgear items are pricey but they are high quality and last forever. You get your money’s worth!
customer_reviews.author: MCRinOC

customer_reviews.title: Best product in this category I have found.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Have been wearing these for years. A bit expensive, but a great value when you consider how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent workout shirts, keeps your body cool when you are sweating out the workout
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: My go to workout shirt
customer_reviews.text: My go to workout shirt. I went one size up. It wicks sweat away and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: nimbleinSD

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's HeatGear Armour Sleeveless Compression T-shirt
product_meta.description: HeatGear fabric, with all the benefits of UA Compression, comfortable enough to be worn all day. Stretch-mesh underarm panels deliver strategic ventilation. UPF 30 protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. Anti-odor technology prevents the growth of odor-causing microbes. Mesh panel on back neck with ARMOUR wordmark.
feature_bullets: HeatGear fabric, with all the benefits of UA Compression, comfortable enough to be worn all day
Stretch mesh underarm panels deliver strategic ventilation
UPF 30 protects your skin from the sun's harmful rays
4 way stretch construction moves better in every direction
Material wicks sweat & dries really fast
